author: samisa
msg: Removed strdup for paused pase name

author: cam
msg: 1. Fix NPE when removing an active animation from the document.

author: fuzzylogic
msg: Merge 495136 to Derby 10.2, fix pointer to empty.jar to make sure that Ant 1.7
doesn't prefix the JVM classes onto the classpath.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Changed initialization of SCARuntime to atomic in a multithreaded environment. Adjusted WS and REST bindings to this change. Added missing config parameters to configure the Tuscany install directory and SCA system base URI.

author: fuzzylogic
msg: Fix broken link to empty.jar. Needs to be fixed due to new build.sysclasspath
behavior in Ant 1.7.0, which would prefix the jvm classpath to javac tasks if the sysclasspath behavior is not overridden.
